sentence: As for the rest of the contingent Washington's Jaime Herrera Beutler, Wyoming's Liz Cheney, Michigan's Peter Meijer, Washington's Dan Newhouse, South Carolina's Tom Rice, and California's David Valadao each appear to be running for re-election this year.
author: Steve Benen
title: Another GOP member of the Impeachment 10 heads for the exits

sentence: One of their spots tries to portray Britt as an anti-Trumper in the mold of Liz Cheney, but as the Washington Post's Dave Weigel notes, "The evidence that Britt will become a Trump critic ... is that Donald Trump Jr. said so in a tweet."
title: Morning Digest: Ohio Court orders new House map after striking down gerrymandered GOP districts

sentence: Like Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Rep. Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, the former GOP nominee is also one of the few in his party to call out Trump's extremism, in the knowledge that he is ostracizing himself from his own party.
author: Stephen Collinson
title: Obama and Romney are back, and show how American politics have changed for the worse

sentence: Republicans who are openly critical of Trump, including Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, have been rebuked by their party members.
author: Oma Seddiq
title: Biden blasts the Republican Party after tapes show McCarthy privately criticized Trump over January 6: 'This is a MAGA party now'
